title: Best Web3 Community âœ¨
description: WebXDAO is simply the best community out there! I can't express enough how grateful I am to be a part of it. The members are incredibly supportive and helped me build my first DAPP. But that's not all, I even got the chance to participate in hackathons with the founders twice! WebXDAO has given me so many opportunities, guidance, resources, and hands-on experience. I can't recommend this community enough for anyone interested in Web3. 10,000/10!
